category_comment: VITAL is an external system that could be used for content publishing. The toggle helps disabling the publishing option to VITAL when needed. VITAL started around 2008 and was decomissioned in 2013 (http://ccnmtl.columbia.edu/vital/nsf/index.html).

name: allow_zencoder

routers.commit_message_added: put zencoder upload behind a feature flag, since it's currently non-functional
routers.commit_message_deleted: just remove zencoder altogether. if we do anything, it will be AWS

category_comment: Initial experimental support was added to Zencoder at 1cc63c9. The toggle was added 50 days later.

name: enable_720p

routers.commit_message_added:
Merge pull request #30 from ccnmtl/disable-hd

put HD workflow behind a waffle switch. PMT #97709

category_comment: The feature was introduced to support both 480 and 720 encoding options. The toggle (switch) was introduced after 40 days to disable the 720 option. Also, the merged branch was named to disable the said option. All these conditions clearly indicate the toggle is used to keep the system performance under control.
